home.ctaText: Start managing your dairy operations efficiently and join the growing OUR Dairy community.

hero.title: OUR Dairy
hero.subtitle: Complete Dairy Management Platform
hero.description: An end-to-end platform that digitalizes and streamlines the entire milk supply chain, connecting Admins, Dairies, Milk Vendors, and Farmers into one integrated ecosystem with transparent workflows and efficient operations.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.description: Everything you need to manage, track, and streamline your dairy operations, securely and efficiently.

transactionManagement.title: Transaction Management
transactionManagement.description: Efficiently record and track daily milk transactions between sellers and dairy owners.

automatedBilling.title: Automated Billing
automatedBilling.description: Generate accurate 15-day bills automatically with detailed transaction summaries.

paymentTracking.title: Payment Tracking
paymentTracking.description: Monitor payment statuses and ensure timely settlements for all transactions.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: OUR Dairy
about.description1: OUR Dairy is an end-to-end platform designed to digitalize and streamline the entire milk supply chain. It connects Admins, Dairies, Milk Vendors, and Farmers into one integrated ecosystem with role-based access and highly transparent workflows.
about.description2: The system ensures efficient milk collection, supply tracking, payment handling, and relationship management between all stakeholders, creating a transparent, error-free, and traceable milk supply chain.
about.latestFeaturesDescription: Streamline Dairy Operations Without the Complexity — Customizable, Scalable and User-Friendly Transaction Management Platform.

lightningFast.title: Lightning-Fast Transaction Recording
lightningFast.description: Record daily milk transactions instantly with minimal load times and optimized performance.

automatedBillingSystem.title: Automated Billing System
automatedBillingSystem.description: Generate accurate 15-day cycle bills automatically with detailed transaction summaries.

securePayment.title: Secure Payment Management
securePayment.description: Track payment statuses securely and ensure timely settlements for all stakeholders.

userTypeModal.title: Choose Your Role
userTypeModal.description: Select how you want to access the platform:

farmer.name: Farmer
farmer.description: Manage your milk production and track transactions

vendor.name: Vendor
vendor.description: Sell milk and manage your vendor operations

dairy.name: Dairy
dairy.description: Manage dairy operations and milk collection

footer.description: An end-to-end platform that digitalizes and streamlines the entire milk supply chain, connecting Admins, Dairies, Milk Vendors, and Farmers into one integrated ecosystem with transparent workflows and efficient operations.

testimonials.testimonial1: I've been using Our Dairy platform for nearly two years, and it has been incredibly user-friendly, making my daily transaction management much easier and more efficient.
testimonials.testimonial2: The automated billing system has transformed how I track my milk deliveries. Payment transparency and accuracy have improved significantly since using this platform.
testimonials.testimonial3: Our Dairy has streamlined our entire operation. The transaction recording and payment tracking features have made our dairy business more profitable and organized.

farmer.title: Farmer Portal
farmer.subtitle: Your comprehensive platform for milk supply management and payment tracking
farmer.description: A specialized platform designed to help farmers supply milk, track daily quantities, view transparent rate calculations, and monitor payment status. Login to access your farmer dashboard and manage your milk supply effectively.
farmer.keyFeaturesDesc: Everything you need to manage your milk supply and track payments transparently
farmer.whyChooseDesc: Get fair payments and complete transparency in your milk supply chain
farmer.readyToStartDesc: Login to access the Farmer Portal and start managing your milk supply today

dailySupply.title: Daily Supply Details
dailySupply.description: Record and track your daily milk supply with accurate quantity measurements and quality parameters.

rateCard.title: Rate Card Visibility
rateCard.description: View transparent rate calculations based on fat, SNF, and CLR readings. Know exactly what you're earning per liter.

paymentHistory.title: Payment History
paymentHistory.description: Track all your payments with detailed history. Monitor daily, weekly, and monthly payment status.

notifications.title: Notifications & Announcements
notifications.description: Stay updated with important announcements, rate changes, and notifications from your vendor and dairy.

supplyTracking.title: Supply Tracking
supplyTracking.description: Monitor your milk supply history, quality trends, and performance metrics over time.

vendorManagement.title: Vendor Management
vendorManagement.description: View your assigned vendor details, contact information, and maintain clear communication channels.

steps.step1Desc: Access your farmer dashboard by logging in with your credentials.
steps.step2Desc: Deliver your milk to your assigned vendor. The vendor will record quantity, quality readings (fat, SNF, CLR), and timing.
steps.step3Desc: Check your daily milk supply records, quality results, and rate per liter calculated based on fat/SNF content.
steps.step4Desc: Monitor your payment history and status. View daily, weekly, and monthly payment records for complete transparency.

benefits.fairRate: Fair rate calculation based on quality

vendor.title: Milk Vendor Portal
vendor.subtitle: Your operational hub for milk collection and supply management
vendor.description: A specialized platform designed to help milk vendors collect milk from farmers, verify quality, supply to dairies, and manage farmer payments. Login to access your vendor dashboard and streamline your operations.
vendor.keyFeaturesDesc: Everything you need to efficiently manage milk collection and supply operations
vendor.responsibilitiesDesc: As a milk vendor, you are the operational link between farmers and dairies
vendor.readyToStartDesc: Login to access the Milk Vendor Portal and start managing your operations today

farmerManagement.title: Farmer Management
farmerManagement.description: Manage all farmers assigned to you. View farmer details, contact information, and supply history.

milkCollection.title: Milk Collection Recording
milkCollection.description: Record daily milk collection from farmers with accurate quantity, quality readings (fat, SNF, CLR), and timings.

dailySupply.title: Daily Supply Summary
dailySupply.description: Track and summarize daily milk supply to your dairy. Maintain complete records of all transactions.

paymentLedger.title: Farmer Payment Ledger
paymentLedger.description: Manage payment logs for all farmers. Track payments, generate reports, and maintain transparent records.

routeManagement.title: Route & Timing Management
routeManagement.description: Organize collection routes, manage timing schedules, and optimize your milk collection operations.

qualityVerification.title: Quality Verification
qualityVerification.description: Verify and record milk quality parameters including fat, SNF, and CLR readings for accurate rate calculation.

steps.step1Desc: Access your vendor dashboard by logging in with your credentials.
steps.step2Desc: Collect milk from your assigned farmers. Verify and record quantity, quality readings (fat, SNF, CLR), and collection timings.
steps.step3Desc: Supply collected milk to your assigned dairy. Maintain daily supply summaries and complete transaction records.
steps.step4Desc: Track and manage payment logs for all farmers. Generate payment reports and maintain transparent payment records.

dairy.title: Dairy Portal
dairy.subtitle: Your central hub for milk processing and supply chain management
dairy.description: A specialized platform designed to help dairies manage vendors, monitor milk collection, track quality metrics, and handle payment cycles. Login to access your dairy dashboard and optimize your operations.
dairy.keyFeaturesDesc: Everything you need to efficiently manage your dairy operations and supply chain
dairy.capabilitiesDesc: Act as a central processing and monitoring hub for your entire supply chain
dairy.readyToStartDesc: Login to access the Dairy Portal and start managing your operations today

vendorManagement.title: Vendor Management
vendorManagement.description: Manage all vendors under your dairy. View vendor details, performance metrics, and supply records.

farmerNetwork.title: Farmer Network Overview
farmerNetwork.description: Get a comprehensive view of all farmers in your network through your vendors. Monitor supply trends and relationships.

collectionReports.title: Milk Collection Reports
collectionReports.description: View detailed milk collection reports with quality metrics (fat, SNF, CLR), quantity, and timings from all vendors.

paymentManagement.title: Vendor Payment Management
paymentManagement.description: Handle payment cycles for vendors. Track payments, generate reports, and maintain transparent financial records.

analytics.title: Supply Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Analyze supply trends, monitor performance metrics, and get insights to improve operational efficiency.

qualityMonitoring.title: Quality Monitoring
qualityMonitoring.description: Monitor milk quality parameters across all vendors. Track fat, SNF, and CLR readings for quality assurance.

steps.step1Desc: Access your dairy dashboard by logging in with your credentials.
steps.step2Desc: Oversee all vendors assigned to your dairy. Monitor their performance, supply records, and manage vendor relationships.
steps.step3Desc: View detailed milk collection reports from all vendors. Track quantity, quality metrics (fat, SNF, CLR), and collection timings.
steps.step4Desc: Manage payment cycles for all vendors. Track payments, generate reports, and maintain transparent financial records.
steps.step5Desc: Use analytics dashboard to analyze supply trends, monitor performance metrics, and get insights to improve operational efficiency.

vet.title: Our Vet +
vet.subtitle: Your comprehensive veterinary medicine app for all farm animals
vet.description: A specialized platform designed to help farmers and animal owners find the right medicines, consult with veterinary doctors, and manage animal health effectively. Login to access expert veterinary care for cows, buffaloes, and all your farm animals.
vet.keyFeaturesDesc: Everything you need to ensure the health and well-being of your farm animals
vet.supportedAnimalsDesc: Our vet app supports comprehensive care for all types of farm animals
vet.readyToStartDesc: Login to access the Our Vet + app and start managing your animals' health today

symptomFinder.title: Symptom-Based Medicine Finder
symptomFinder.description: Enter your animal's symptoms and get instant recommendations for appropriate medicines and treatments.

consult.title: Consult with Vet Doctors
consult.description: Connect with certified veterinary doctors for professional consultations and expert advice on animal health.

medicineDatabase.title: Comprehensive Medicine Database
medicineDatabase.description: Access a vast database of medicines and treatments specifically designed for cows, buffaloes, and all farm animals.

healthRecords.title: Health Records Management
healthRecords.description: Maintain detailed health records for all your animals, track treatments, and monitor recovery progress.

preventiveCare.title: Preventive Care Guidelines
preventiveCare.description: Get preventive care recommendations and vaccination schedules to keep your animals healthy and disease-free.

emergencyCare.title: Emergency Care Support
emergencyCare.description: Quick access to emergency care protocols and immediate veterinary assistance when your animals need urgent help.

steps.step1Desc: Create an account or login to access the veterinary app and all its features.
steps.step2Desc: Enter your animal's symptoms and get instant recommendations for appropriate medicines and treatment options from our comprehensive database.
steps.step3Desc: Schedule consultations with certified veterinary doctors for professional diagnosis, treatment plans, and expert advice tailored to your animal's specific needs.
steps.step4Desc: Keep track of all your animals' health records, treatments, and medical history in one convenient place for better care management.
